page.title: 20ENTERTAINMENTS
page.content: IN this rural area there are only limited entertainment facilities.{THE {CROWN}at Staplehay is the main public House.In the east of the area lies {Taunton Racecourse,}where horse racing takes place infrequently(4-6 times a year).The race course is also the venue for an annual{Fun Day}at which a number of events such as demonstration of police dogs,or motor bike stunts take place along with many stalls where children can be made up as clowns or punks for example. {Gatchell House}is a private sports club for squash players of some merit drawing players from all over the area.The Somerset Area Police Training Centre at Canonsgrove also arrange the occasional dances. No doubt if Trull and the southern part of Taunton near Fullands continue to expand,facilities will increase.
